product_summary: Goast is an AI assistant that helps engineering teams fix bugs faster. It analyzes and resolves issues from your error log, pinpoints the root cause of the problem, and generates a step-by-step solution plan. Goast can also push the fix as a pull request for your dev team to review and iterate on.
product_pros: Instantly resolve errors & exceptions with the help of a 24-hour, on-call AI assistant
Get a fix before you know there's an issue
Find the root cause of the problem, instantly

product_usecases.details: Goast can help you debug errors in your code by analyzing the error log and pinpointing the root cause of the problem.
Goast can help you fix bugs in your code by generating a step-by-step solution plan.
Goast can help you prevent bugs in your code by identifying potential problems and suggesting fixes.
Goast can help you improve the quality of your code by identifying and fixing bugs.
Goast can help you reduce development time by automating the process of debugging and fixing bugs.

product_toolfor.details: Goast is a tool for developers that can help them debug and fix bugs faster.
Goast is a tool for engineering teams that can help them resolve issues from their error log faster.
Goast is a tool for QA teams that can help them identify and fix bugs.
Goast is a tool for product managers that can help them track and resolve bugs.
Goast is a tool for project managers that can help them track and manage the progress of bug fixes.
